mapper.select: SELECT a.movie_id, a.title, a.release_date, round(a.tmdb_vote_sum, 2) as tmdb_vote_sum, a.tmdb_vote_cnt, a.poster_path FROM (SELECT * FROM movie WHERE tmdb_vote_cnt >= 100 AND popularity >= 30 AND release_date >= '00/01/01' ORDER BY tmdb_vote_sum DESC) A WHERE rownum <= 20

SELECT a.movie_id, a.title, a.release_date, round(a.tmdb_vote_sum, 2) as tmdb_vote_sum, a.tmdb_vote_cnt, a.poster_path FROM (SELECT * FROM movie WHERE tmdb_vote_cnt >= 100 AND popularity >= 30 AND release_date <= '90/01/01' ORDER BY tmdb_vote_sum DESC) A WHERE rownum <= 20
SELECT movie_id, title, release_date, round(tmdb_vote_sum, 2) as tmdb_vote_sum, overview, poster_path, backdrop_path, country, runtime FROM movie WHERE movie_id = #{movie_id}
SELECT * FROM movie_genre mg JOIN genre g ON mg.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE mg.movie_id = #{movie_id}
SELECT * FROM director d JOIN movie_director md ON d.director_id = md.director_id WHERE md.movie_id = #{movie_id}
SELECT * FROM actor a join movie_actor ma ON a.actor_id = ma.actor_id where ma.movie_id = #{movie_id} AND a.profile_path IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM movie m join movie_images mi ON m.movie_id = mi.movie_id where m.movie_id = #{movie_id}
mapper.insert: insert into review values (#{movie_id}, 1, #{rating}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, sysdate, sysdate, '1')
